commit.message:
re PR libstdc++/15361 (bitset<>::_Find_next fails)

	    Ivan Godard  <igodard@pacbell.net>

	PR libstdc++/15361

	* testsuite/23_containers/bitset/ext/15361.cc: New.

From-SVN: r81852
